mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Diana J. Simmons (now Thompson), Ward until she turned 21 years of age on 01.01.1895
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Diana J. Simmons (now Thompson), Ward until she turned 21 years of age on 01.01.1895 Coffee Dickerson, Guardian Recorded in Ledger Book 4 F, Page 323, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
